ac: 40, touch 17, flat-footed 36 (+4 deflection, +4 Dex, +23 natural, -1 size)
special_attacks: constrict (tail slap, 2d6+15 plus crushing coils), greater infuse weapon, multiweapon mastery, mythic power (8/day, surge +1d10), poisoned weapons
melee: +2 longsword +28/+23/+18/+13 (2d6+12/16-20 plus poison), 5 +2 longswords +28 (2d6+7/16-20 plus poison), tail slap +20 (2d6+5 plus grab)

spells.spell-like abilities:
(CL 16th; concentration +24)

Constant-true seeing, unholy aura (DC 26)

At will-greater teleport (self plus 50 lbs. of objects only), project image (DC 25), telekinesis (DC 23)

3/day-blade barrier (DC 24), fly, heal (self only)

1/day-summon (level 5, 1 marilith 20%, 1 nalfeshnee 35%, or 1d4 hezrous 60%)

feats: Bleeding CriticalM, Combat ExpertiseM, Combat Reflexes, Critical FocusM, Improved Critical (longsword)M, Improved Disarm, Power Attack, Weapon Focus (longsword)
description: This snake-bodied woman has six arms, yet her cruel weapons float in the air, glistening with poison.

sections.body: A constricted creature must succeed at a DC 28 Fortitude save or lose consciousness for 1d8 rounds. The save DC is Strength-based.
sections.name: Crushing Coils

sections.body: Any weapon a mythic marilith wields gains a +2 enhancement bonus and counts as a chaotic and evil cold iron weapon. She can expend two uses of mythic power as an immediate action to add the dancing special ability to all her manufactured weapons for 4 rounds.
sections.name: Greater Infuse Weapon

sections.body: As a swift action, a mythic marilith can lick one of her manufactured weapons to coat it with deathblade poison.
sections.name: Poisoned Weapons

sections.body: A mythic marilith is a queen of chaos and evil, controlling a large territory in the Abyss and commanding a legion of demons.

special_qualities: change shape (any animal, humanoid, or giant; shapechange)
name: Demon, Marilith, Mythic
skills: Acrobatics +23, Bluff +27, Diplomacy +27, Fly +18, Intimidate +27, Knowledge (engineering) +20, Perception +31, Sense Motive +23, Stealth +19, Use Magic Device +27
organization: solitary, pair, or platoon (1 marilith, 1-3 glabrezus, and 3-14 babaus)
